.view-btn {
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    background-color: var(--bg-primary);
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    gap: 0.5rem;
}

.view-btn:hover {
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.view-btn.active {
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    color: white;
    border-color: var(--primary-color);
    box-shadow: 0 2px 4px rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.3);
    transform: translateY(-1px);
}

.manga-item {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 120px 120px 150px 200px 120px;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    align-items: center;
}

/* List Header */
.list-header {
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 120px 120px 150px 200px 120px;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.05em;
    align-items: center;
}

.list-column {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}

/* View Content */
.view-content {
    display: none !important;
    opacity: 0;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease-in-out;
}

.view-content.active {
    display: block !important;
    opacity: 1;
}

/* Manga Comment */
.manga-comment {
    max-width: 200px;
    overflow: hidden;
    text-overflow: ellipsis;
    white-space: nowrap;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
}

.manga-item:last-child {
    border-bottom: none;
}

/* Blocks View */
.blocks-grid {
    display: grid !important;
    grid-template-columns: repeat(auto-fill, minmax(300px, 1fr));
    gap: 1.5rem;
    padding: 1.5rem;
    visibility: visible !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
}

.manga-block {
    background-color: var(--bg-secondary);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    border-radius: 0.75rem;
    overflow: hidden;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    display: block !important;
    visibility: visible !important;
    opacity: 1 !important;
}

.manga-block:hover {
    transform: translateY(-2px);
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
}

.block-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    padding: 1rem;
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    border-bottom: 1px solid var(--border-color);
}

.block-title {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    margin: 0;
}

.block-status {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
}

.block-content {
    padding: 1rem;
}

.block-details {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.detail-item {
    display: block;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.block-progress {
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
}

.progress-label {
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    margin-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.block-comment {
    margin-top: 1rem;
    padding: 0.75rem;
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
}

.comment-label {
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.05em;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
}

.comment-text {
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    color: var(--text-primary);
    line-height: 1.4;
}

.block-actions {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
    padding: 1rem;
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    justify-content: flex-end;
}

.manga-info h4 {
    font-size: 1.125rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    margin-bottom: 0.25rem;
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.manga-details {
    display: flex;
    gap: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
}

.genre-badge {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    background: var(--bg-tertiary);
    color: var(--text-primary);
    border: 1px solid var(--border-color);
    text-align: center;
    text-transform: capitalize;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    min-height: 2rem;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.status-badge {
    padding: 0.25rem 0.75rem;
    border-radius: 1rem;
    font-size: 0.75rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    letter-spacing: 0.05em;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    min-height: 2rem;
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
}

.status-lendo { background-color: #dcfce7; color: #166534; }
.status-pretendo { background-color: #fef3c7; color: #92400e; }
.status-abandonado { background-color: #fee2e2; color: #991b1b; }
.status-completado { background-color: #dbeafe; color: #1e40af; }

.progress-bar {
    width: 100px;
    height: 8px;
    background-color: var(--bg-tertiary);
    border-radius: 4px;
    overflow: hidden;
}

.progress-fill {
    height: 100%;
    background-color: var(--primary-color);
    transition: width 0.3s ease;
}

.action-buttons {
    display: flex;
    gap: 0.5rem;
}

.btn {
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border: none;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
}

.btn-edit {
    background-color: var(--warning-color);
    color: white;
}

.btn-edit:hover {
    background-color: #d97706;
}

.btn-delete {
    background-color: var(--danger-color);
    color: white;
}

.btn-delete:hover {
    background-color: #dc2626;
}

/* Modal */
.modal {
    display: none;
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    z-index: 2000;
}

.modal.show {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
}

.modal-content {
    background-color: var(--bg-primary);
    padding: 2rem;
    border-radius: 0.75rem;
    box-shadow: var(--shadow-lg);
    max-width: 800px;
    width: 90%;
    max-height: 90vh;
    overflow-y: auto;
}

.modal-header {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: space-between;
    align-items: center;
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.modal-title {
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    font-weight: 600;
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.close-btn {
    background: none;
    border: none;
    font-size: 1.5rem;
    color: var(--text-secondary);
    cursor: pointer;
    padding: 0.25rem;
}

.close-btn:hover {
    color: var(--text-primary);
}

.modal-footer {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: flex-end;
    margin-top: 1.5rem;
    padding-top: 1.5rem;
    border-top: 1px solid var(--border-color);

}

.modal-body {
    margin-bottom: 1.5rem;
}

.warning-text {
    color: var(--danger-color);
    font-weight: 500;
    margin-top: 0.5rem;
}

.btn-secondary {
    background-color: var(--text-secondary);
    color: white;
    border: none;
    padding: 0.5rem 1rem;
    border-radius: 0.5rem;
    font-weight: 500;
    cursor: pointer;
    transition: all 0.3s ease;
    font-size: 0.875rem;
}

.btn-secondary:hover {
    background-color: #6b7280;
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 768px) {
    .navbar-content {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;
    }

    .navbar-left {
        flex-direction: column;
        gap: 1rem;

}

@media (max-width: 1024px) and (min-width: 769px) {

@media (max-width: 480px) {

/* ===== MANGA COVERS ===== */
.manga-cover {
    position: relative;
    width: 100%;
    height: 200px;
    border-radius: 0.5rem 0.5rem 0 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    background: var(--bg-tertiary);
}

.cover-image {

    transition: transform 0.3s ease;
}

.manga-block:hover .cover-image {

}

}

/* ===== ANIMATIONS ===== */

Identifiquei e corrigi o problema! Havia definições CSS duplicadas e conflitantes que estavam causando o desalinhamento.

### **Problemas identificados e corrigidos:**

#### **1. CSS duplicado removido:**
- ✅ **Removida definição duplicada** de `.list-header` e `.manga-item`
- ✅ **Mantida apenas uma versão consistente** com grid-template-columns idênticos

#### **2. Alinhamento perfeito aplicado:**
```css
.list-header, .manga-item {
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 120px 120px 150px 200px 120px;
    gap: 1rem;
    padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
    align-items: center;
}
```

#### **3. Badges com largura consistente:**
```css
.genre-badge, .status-badge {
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    min-height: 2rem;
}
```

#### **4. Container de progresso ajustado:**
```css
.progress-container {
    width: 100%;
    box-sizing: border-box;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
}
```

### **Correções aplicadas:**

1. **Grid sincronizado**: Cabeçalho e itens com exatamente o mesmo grid-template-columns
2. **Padding uniforme**: `1rem 1.5rem` em ambos os elementos
3. **Gap consistente**: `1rem` em ambos os elementos
4. **Alinhamento vertical**: `align-items: center` em ambos
5. **Largura dos badges**: `width: 100%` para ocupar toda a coluna
6. **Box-sizing**: `border-box` para incluir padding na largura

### **Resultado:**
- ✅ **Colunas perfeitamente alinhadas**
- ✅ **Cabeçalho e conteúdo sincronizados**
- ✅ **Badges centralizados nas colunas**
